恐るる勿れ: (おそるるなかれ) - Be not afraid

恐れ戦く: (おそれおののく) - to tremble with fear
恐れ気もなく: (おそれげもなく) - courageously; fearlessly; defiantly; boldly

恐察: (きょうさつ) - taking another's opinion into consideration

恐悦至極: (きょうえつしごく) - (yoji) extremely delighted

恐惶謹言: (きょうこうきんげん) - (yoji) Very truly yours (a complimentary close used in a letter written in an old epistolary style)

恐懼感激: (きょうくかんげき) - (yoji) being struck with awe; deeply moved with awe
